Package com.appscend.media

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    APSMediaBuilder
    The APSMediaBuilder assists in creating playlists of fully configurable APSMediaUnits, together with attached, configurable APSMediaOverlays, using JSON files or using a HashMap, both following the same structure.
    APSMediaBuilder.getDataAsync
    Helper class that is used to get data from an URL asynchronous
    APSMediaEvents  
    APSMediaOverlay
    APSMediaOverlay describes any overlay that the APSMediaPlayer instance needs to render during playback.
    APSMediaPlayer
    The APSMediaPlayer handles playback and rendering of APSMediaUnits and APSMediaOverlays.
    APSMediaTrackableObject
    Defines the properties that an object needs to implement to become trackable by the player.
    APSMediaUnit
    The APSMediaUnit class represents a clip that's ready to be rendered by the player.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    APSMediaBuilder.APSResolvMultipleAdsConflictsBy
    The VMAP standard permits allowing only one ad from a certain ad source.
    APSMediaBuilder.MPMovieControlStyle  
    APSMediaOverlay.APSMediaOverlayPosition
    Describes the position the overlay should take when placed on-screen by the player.
    APSMediaPlayer.MPMovieFinishReason  
    APSMediaPlayer.MPMoviePlaybackState  
    APSMediaUnit.APSMediaControlsDisplay
    Specifies how the controls bar should be displayed for a media unit.
